Uses of Interface
edu.cuny.ai.learning.LearningPolicy

Packages that use LearningPolicy
edu.cuny.ai.learning   
 

Uses of LearningPolicy in edu.cuny.ai.learning
 

Classes in edu.cuny.ai.learning that implement LearningPolicy
 class ActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy framework used by DiscreteLearner to choose an action out of multiple discrete actions.
 class AdaptiveReturnUpdatingPolicy
           A policy used by StimuliResponseLearner to update the expected returns of multiple discrete actions.
 class AdaptiveReturnUpdatingPolicyWithBias
           An expected return updating policy that uses bias towards those untaken actions each time.
 class EpsilonGreedyActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy used by StimuliResponseLearner to update the expected returns of multiple discrete actions based on the epsilon-greedy method in Section 2.2, Sutton and Barto's RL book
 class EpsilonGreedyMultiActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy that chooses multiple actions from a set of actions based on their expected returns, using a EpsilonGreedyActionChoosingPolicy to choose these actions one by one.
 class MultiActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy framework to choose multiple actions out of a set of discrete actions based on expected returns of these actions.
 class RandomActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy used by StimuliResponseLearner to randomly choose an action from the action set.
 class ReturnUpdatingPolicy
           A policy used by StimuliResponseLearner to update the expected returns of multiple discrete actions.
 class SoftmaxActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy used by StimuliResponseLearner to update the expected returns of multiple discrete actions based on the softmax method in Section 2.3, Sutton and Barto's RL book
 class SoftmaxMultiActionChoosingPolicy
           A policy that chooses multiple actions from a set of actions based on their expected returns, using a SoftmaxActionChoosingPolicy to choose these actions one by one.
